mutants.code:
def generate_pattern(K: int) -> list[str]:
    pattern = []
    m = K
    x = 2
    for i in range(K):
        line = ''
        for j in range(m):
            line += str(x)
            x += 1
        pattern.append(line)
        m -= 1
    return pattern
